mapper.select: SELECT id, group_code, code, code_name, code_name_en, code_name_jp, description, sort_order, is_active, extra_data, created_at, updated_at FROM common_codes ORDER BY group_code ASC, sort_order ASC, id ASC

SELECT id, group_code, code, code_name, code_name_en, code_name_jp, description, sort_order, is_active, extra_data, created_at, updated_at FROM common_codes WHERE group_code = #{groupCode} ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id ASC
SELECT id, group_code, code, code_name, code_name_en, code_name_jp, description, sort_order, is_active, extra_data, created_at, updated_at FROM common_codes WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, group_code, code, code_name, code_name_en, code_name_jp, description, sort_order, is_active, extra_data, created_at, updated_at FROM common_codes WHERE group_code = #{groupCode} AND code = #{code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO common_codes (group_code, code, code_name, code_name_en, code_name_jp, description, sort_order, is_active, extra_data, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{groupCode}, #{code}, #{codeName}, #{codeNameEn}, #{codeNameJp}, #{description}, #{sortOrder}, #{isActive}, #{extraData}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE common_codes SET code_name = #{codeName}, code_name_en = #{codeNameEn}, code_name_jp = #{codeNameJp}, description = #{description}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, is_active = #{isActive}, extra_data = #{extraData}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
